Point I want to say is my grandmother just passed away. She was 107, cognitively intact till last moment, never in life taken medications except for fever or kind. She lived a simple care free life , not eating a lot , not any balanced diet definitely.

32:20 Tony Robbins was doing the pescetarian diet. But then the level of mercury in his system shot up. He mentions that in one of his interviews. Matters where the fish is from.

Question: Could we fast forward the cellular clock in Plants and trees and then slow it down. And do it in a way whereby the faster cycle doesn't cause cancer? I am thinking for enabling forests on Mars and other habitats.

26:36 Wow! Okay, so cells need to read some information in order to be able to perform at an optimal level. So cells are not able to read the genetic information and this then hampers their function. But now we have some means whereby cells can indeed read this information. Doing so revives the ability of the cell to be able to function. Plus there is also a cellular clock.
